segments.text: Are you ok , Chuck ? You look pale .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm fine , Katherine . I just stayed up late last night working on my Chinese .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , poor you . You know what ? I found a new way to learn Chinese and it works very well .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You did ? Do tell me . I've spent all these months trying to learn something new about it , but I've made little progress !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure . I'm learning Chinese through songs .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can say that . I can actually sing some of them now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's a real achievement . How did you do that ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I start by listening to the song a few times and after several times I am able to follow the singer .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It does . I've learned some Chinese folk songs this way . They are clearly presented and easy to follow .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can Join you , Katherine ? I do want to have a try .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why not ? I downloaded a beautiful song the other day . We can learn it together now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Great . Do you think we need a Chinese dictionary ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , just in case we run into me new characters .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok . I will bring it with me .
segments.speaker: S2
